1010100100010111 1101100101000001 1 -> sum: 1000001001011001, cout: 1
0010000100101110 1100111110100001 1 -> sum: 1111000011010000, cout: 0

1110100011001101 1011000111001101 0 -> sum: 1001101010011010, cout: 1
1101110001100110 1111111100001011 0 -> sum: 1101101101110001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
